body.name: TECKNET Bluetooth Headphones Over Ear, 65H Playtime and 3 EQ Modes Wireless Headphones with Microphone, Foldable Adjustable Lightweight Hi-Res Audio, Deep Bass for Home Traver Work PC Cellphone

Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 13 hrs 58 mins
features: 🎧【65 Hours Playtime】Bluetooth headphones over the ear have a listening time of up to 65 hours in Bluetooth mode, three times longer than other bluetooth headset, you will always have music to motivate you. Easily switch to wired mode when powered off with the included 3.5mm audio cable. It will not be affected by insufficient power.

🎧【3 EQ modes and HiFi Stereo Audio】Wireless headphones has the most advanced dual 40mm dynamic sounding units and 3 EQ modes, specially designed for audiophiles. The balance mode, bass, and treble modes can be switched freely to enjoy different music experiences at concerts or concert halls or at home. No matter what type of music you like, these wireless headphones over ear can meet your needs and immerse you in the world of music.

🎧【Latest Bluetooth 5.3 and Microphone】Bluetooth headphones with mic have built-in Bluetooth 5.3 technology, which can provide more stable transmission speed, lower delay and better audio output, giving you wonderful music enjoyment. Our lightweight over-ear headphones has a built-in microphone for clear, hands-free conversations, just like talking to a friend face-to-face.

🎧【Isolate 95% Noise】TECKNET noise canceling headphones feature a premium padded protein leather headband and luxuriously soft memory foam ear cups that simulate skin texture. Full-surround earcups with passive noise cancellation to detect and reduce a wider range of low and mid-frequency noises, such as car and aircraft engines and busy offices. Isolates 95% of outside living noise.

🎧【Bluetooth Headphones Designed to Fit You】Headphones wireless bluetooth with microphone are equipped with an advanced retractable headband, which fits various head shapes without pain. Softer, more comfortable memory protein ear cups protect your ears during long-term use. The foldable and lightweight design weighs only 0.44 lbs, making it the perfect choice for travel, workouts, and everyday use.

🎧【36-Month Support】Reminder: It is recommended to remove wireless headphones over ear every 1-2 hours, so your ears can relax for a pleasant hearing experience. By choosing TECKNET, You are covered with a 36-month warranty and 100% Customer satisfaction(registration only).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got these for my 14 year old. They were a great price and with his tendency to break things I didn't want to buy expensive ones. He uses them everyday and has no complaints. The fit is great and comfortable, the sound it good and I can't hear his music when he's sitting next to me. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seriously impressive at this price
reviews.reviewText: I am a long-time audiophile - going back to the `70s. I have numerous headphones for various duties, but I admittedly bought these simply for doing yard work. I wanted them cheap, wireless and over-the-ear to limit the noise from my power tools (it's getting that time of year I'll be running the blower for hours to clear out my yard).At any rate, as others have also said, these sound way better than they have a right to at this price point. Are they a pair of Grado equivalents? No, not even close. Would I rate them audiophile quality, or even semi-audiophile quality? NO WAY. But again, these were SIXTEEN DOLLARS.I am old enough to remember a time when cheap sound equipment was tinny and distorted. The overwhelming adjective I would use to describe the sound on these is "muddy." They are NOT tinny or distorted, and are missing a lot of brightness, but again, they sound way better than they have a right to for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Design, Great Price
reviews.reviewText: I love these headphones. I bought them to use while running/walking on the treadmill and they work great. They fit over my ears nicely (and I wear earrings) and don't move around while I am working out. The material is really nice and I haven't had any issues with the battery life yet. I also like that they charge with a USB-C charger, which I feel is a lot more common today vs the old android chargers.The ONLY thing I could complain about would be the volume. The music itself doesn't get very loud. It's probably a great idea to prevent ear injuries, but sometimes (especially if I'm listening to a slow song) I wish it could be louder (this is the only reason this product didn't get 5 stars from me).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable, nice sound
reviews.reviewText: These are so comfortable that I often sleep with them on. The sound is very good, and I like that it had different sound modes depending on what you are listening to. I also like that it comes with a cord to connect to your phone so you can use them wired if they are not charged. The battery lasts a long time, I charge them probably every 3 days if I'm using them regularly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Headphones are ok. Not great, but not bad. Good value for money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars TECKNET Bluetooth Headphones Sound so powerful
reviews.reviewText: TECKNET Bluetooth Headphones fit very well and are not too heavy so you can wear them for long periods of time. seem well made and should last a long time. pairing was super fast and they have 65 hour run time. they fold up to half their size. the hinge feels strong with a metal reinforced headband that is fully adjustable. 3 different EQ modes if you want that extra powerful bass these can do it. I will be getting a few more for gifts and my wife needs one, she is always taking mine. comes with a patch cable so you can use on stuff that is not Bluetooth. Over all i am very happy with them . A++

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are the best
reviews.reviewText: I literally love these they are so comfortable! I had beats on ear and they were so painful. I have extremely small ears and they hurt so bad with any type of tension but I can sleep with these on no pain!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Teenage daughter loves them
reviews.reviewText: Great price, good quality, she brought them on a trip we did, recently. Lightweight, comfortable, sturdy and they fold up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent headphones at an excellent price…
reviews.reviewText: These arrived a week ago and look fantastic.Pairing:Easy to pair with my Windows laptop and Aplle phone.Phone Calls:They are great for clear phone calls and the other person can hear me clearer than through my phone microphone. Certainly they are better than any comparably priced Bluetooth headset where the other side know i am on Bluetooth and will often say I sound fuzzy. It has been windy this week with Ciara and Dennis but I am still able to be heard in the wind. They isolate noise well, so the caller is as clear as if I were in a quiet office on a landline.They look like a nice pair of cans and have no “Britney mic”. I look decidedly odd walking down the road wearing them and talking to myself.Comfort:They are light and fit my head perfectly and without the lead, I can forget they are on.Music:They paired twice to my PC with a music (headphone) mode and a phone (headset) mode and both seem right for the purpose. The music mode gives great bass.Battery:I have not recharged them in the week I have had the headphones and they still have some juice.I would highly recommend these...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 2, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I'm not one for the earbud / in ear type headphones, they usually annoy me by either falling out or causing pain after using them for a short while, so I was in the market for a not too expensive pair of wireless on the ear or over the ear headphones. I know of Tecknet as a trustworthy brand after buying several items in the past from them, but was surprised to see they also make headphones! The price was right and they looked the business so placed the order!Firstly I was pleasantly suprised at the perfectly formed small box these come in, headphones in the past always seem to come in a massive space wasting box. I guess the fact that these are foldable saves so much space and is partly why I bought them. Everything is included in the box, including instructions, charging cable and a handy plug in 3.5mm cable for when bluetooth is not an option!Pairing with my iPhone was easy, and although I'm mainly using these to listen to podcasts, listening to music on Spotify was pleasant. These are not the most bass driven of headphones, but sound is clear and precise, and easily as good as others costing triple the price. My son has apple earpods and my wife has Bose headphones, I think these are equally as good as the earpods, and although you can't really compare with the £200+ Bose headphones, for the price these are a bargain, especially for my needs.Spot on purchase, don't hesitate if thinking about purchasing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 21, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I got these with confidence as I have a few Tecknet items now, and they are always excellent. Not had a bad product from them.They arrived in a smaller box than I was expecting, but this is because they fold down twice- once on the headband, and again into themselves. Very impressive, and I love the compact nature of this- makes it easy to throw in a bag without using major space.Soundwise, they are excellent at passively reducing outside noise, so be aware you won't hear your environment. Great if you're somewhere noise, not so great if you're in bed next to your partner who ends up having to poke you to get your attention! Bass is nice without being overpowering, and honestly, everything sounds crisp.They are comfortable to wear for long periods too, not found them too hot or uncomfortable, although I don't wear glasses so your mileage may vary with those.Bluetooth connects nice and fast, and you have the backup of using a cable (supplied), should you run out of batteries or use it on a device that doesn't have BT.All in all, very happy for the price, and would definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 30, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I received these as a Christmas present and am pleased to say they are amazing. I have been using them for several hours since and for different uses including lifting weights at the gym, running and lounging around at home.Wireless: this feature works flawlessly. It was very easy to pair via Bluetooth: a long hold of the power button puts it into pairing mode when used for the first time. Thereafter, my phone automatically connects when I turn them on. I am pleased to say I've had no drops in connection in over 20 hours of use so far, which is impressive as I have used Bluetooth 5.0 devices in the past that lose connection! The wired feature works, I tried it just to see if it works but for me, wireless is the reason you should buy these as it is the ultimate freedom, specially at the gym with no chords faffing about.Comfort: They are very comfortable indeed, the pads around the ears are very soft and the headphones themselves are very light, meaning you don't even notice them when they are on your head after a while! They also fit very well in the sense that they do not move if you are running or something. I prefer to over ear design and these do not touch my ears when on them.Sound: the sound is great. I've used more expensive Bose wireless models before and honestly the sound is somewhat comparable, certainly has more depth and bass. They do not have active noise cancellation, but due to the good foam padding and overall fit, only a bit of outside residual noise can be heard, which is very impressive.I have only used the mic once and the feedback was that the microphone is clear and adequate. They are very easy to carry around too since they can lay flat and fold, see pictures. I can't comment on durability as I've only owned for a few days but I have no doubt they will last for a while :)Overall, I would highly recommend this reliable wireless headphone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: Soild headphones for a reasonable price.
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- Compact designFolded headphones are great!- Easy connectionTook a second to connect and was simple with a good range.- Sound qualityThese headphones are bass-heavy, which if you like then its a great substitute for beats.- DesignOverall the design is minimal but is perfect for being low profile in public. They're also rather light without feeling cheap. They have a nice weight to them despite being plastic, the material seems really solid and I'm not worried they're going to break.- Noise cancellationThe closed design does a good job of cancelling outside noise (not great if you're crossing the road though).Cons:- Noise leakIf the volume is on full the music is heard quite clearly, but at about 75% it's not that bad and at that level, it is perfectly fine.- Cups fold outwardWhen you place the headphones on your neck the cups can only fold outwards which to me is rather bizarre.Overall:These are solid wireless headphones and with 40mm drivers, I'm really impressed with the sound quality and its design. The cons really aren't that serious in my opinion and I'm really pleased with my purchase.
